title: Controlled Cravings
description: Callie has been working for Brusco Enterprises for two years, slowly falling in love with her boss, with the sexy, out-of-her-league alpha of the Sanduske werewolf pack. When her physical needs peak after lusting for so long, the tables abruptly turn.Evan has been suffering in silence for two years, working with and living next door to his curvaceous human mate. He’d been fighting to do the noble thing and give her a choice, but when he uncovers the depth of Callie’s need, everything changes.
author: Christin Lovell
